title: LLM Run Output Metadata
description: Metadata for a single LLM run stored under data/outputs/.

schema_version.description: Version of this metadata schema. Example: '1.0.0'.

run_id.description: Unique identifier for this run within the project (UUID, ULID, or similar).

model.description: Logical model identifier, ideally matching config/models.yaml.

timestamp.description: RFC 3339 timestamp when the run was executed.

input_hash.description: Stable hash of the normalized input payload used for caching/dedup.

duration_ms.description: End-to-end runtime of the call in milliseconds.

input_tokens.description: Number of tokens in the prompt input.

output_tokens.description: Number of tokens in the model output.

total_tokens.description: Total tokens billed for this call.

cost_usd.description: Approximate cost of this run in USD.

metrics.description: Optional evaluation metrics for this run (accuracy, BLEU, etc.).

error_type.description: Short machine-readable error category if status != 'success'.
